DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , open-label , single center , exploratory , Phase 1 study explore change resistance pattern bacteria oral flora healthy male female adult subject . The study enroll approximately 140 healthy subject . Approximately 70 subject receive levofloxacin daily 5 day 70 receive azithromycin daily 5 day . Male female healthy subject , 18 year old may participate . Subjects treat outpatient basis Phase 1 facility . Laboratory test ( blood urine collection ) microbiologic test ( throat swab ) perform dose study drug Study Entry ( Visit 1 ) . Subjects return daily test facility once-daily dose study drug Visits 2 5 total 5 consecutive day . At Visit 5 laboratory microbiologic test perform . Subjects return test facility 2-Week ( Visit 6 ) , 4-Week ( Visit 7 ) 6-Week ( Visit 8 ) Post-Therapy Visits undergo microbiologic testing ( throat swab ) . The primary endpoint emergence bacterial resistance oropharyngeal flora start prior initiation study drug 6-week observation period . Microbiologic test ( throat swab ) conduct prior dose Day 1 follow dosing Days 5 , 19 , 33 , 47 . Safety assessment conduct prior drug administration , study drug treatment , end-of-therapy visit . These include clinical laboratory evaluation , vital sign , physical examination , pregnancy testing , collection adverse event . Serious adverse event collect 30 day follow last dose study drug . Levofloxacin Once-Daily 750 mg PO For 5 Days And Azithromycin Once-Daily 500 mg PO On Day One And Then 250 mg On Days 2 Through 5
